channel.title: CVE Feed for waseem_senjer -- Controlled Admin Access
channel.description: The latest CVEs for waseem_senjer -- Controlled Admin Access

item.title: CVE-2021-4360|2024-08-03T17:23:10.684Z -- waseem_senjer -- controlled%20admin%20access
item.description: The Controlled Admin Access plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Privilege Escalation in versions up to, and including, 1.5.5 by not properly restricting access to the configuration page. This makes it possible for attackers to create a new administrator role with unrestricted access.
